Text: Eat Shop and PlayNew Vindigo ContentNEW FROM VINDIGORESTAURANT REVIEWS FROM GAYOT Were delighted to announce the addition of a great new source of restaurant reviews now available to Vindigo users Gayot Publications provides witty and professional reviews for all Vindigo cities in the US Since the early s Andre Gayot has been directing sophisticated travelers to the best restaurants hotels shops sightseeing and cultural attractions throughout the world He now leads a team of savvy food critics and travel experts and publishes Gayot guidebooks which are informative honest and detailed Above all they tell it like it is Esquire magazine describes Gayot as the best guides out there To learn more about Gayot Publications visit As of November reviews from the Zagat Survey will no longer be available on Vindigo If you currently use Zagat reviews in your version of Vindigo at some time in November when you sync that content will be replaced with content from Gayot To learn more about how to access Zagat content visit wwwzagatcom To find out about additional content available to Vindigo users go to account VINDIGO SURVEY Win for a holiday shopping spree by participating in a Vindigo survey Please contribute to this effort by sending a blank email to mailto ADVERTISEMENTS BLUE FOR MUSICSM Get FREE MPs nowat Blue for Music from American Express Explore our MP Vault and learn how to save on almost everything at Virgin Megastores Visit Blue for Music now at bluevindigo GLORY DAYS Enjoy a Classic Piece of New York Baseball History for Just Glory Days brings to life the legendary period in New York baseball from when three New York teams dominated the sport This unique Web site offers original New York Times articles and photos available for the first time in digital form editorspicksindexhtmlvindigo If you prefer not to receive updates from Vindigo in the future please write to mailto and TYPE YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS in the subject line only If you need technical support please do not reply to this email Visit help
